verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> An <S%H7093>end:<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now is the <S%H7093>end<s%> on <S%H7971>you,<s%> and I will send my <S%H639>anger<s%> on <S%H8199>you,<s%> and will judge you according to your <S%H1870>ways;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> on you all your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

My <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H2550>you,<s%> neither will I have pity; but I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> on <S%H8441>you,<s%> and your abominations shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>you:<s%> and you shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> An <S%H7451>evil,<s%> an <S%H259>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil;<s%> <S%H935>behold,<s%> it comes.
An <S%H7093>end<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> has <S%H935>come;<s%> it <S%H6974>awakes<s%> against <S%H935>you;<s%> behold, it comes.

Your <S%H6843>doom<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3427>you,<s%> inhabitant of the <S%H776>land:<s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H7138>near,<s%> a day of <S%H4103>tumult,<s%> and not of joyful <S%H1906>shouting,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

Now will I <S%H7138>shortly<s%> pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on <S%H3615>you,<s%> and accomplish my <S%H639>anger<s%> against <S%H8199>you,<s%> and will judge you according to your <S%H1870>ways;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> on you all your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

My <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>spare,<s%> neither will I have <S%H2550>pity:<s%> I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> on you according to your <S%H1870>ways;<s%> and your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>you;<s%> and you shall know that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, do <S%H5221>strike.<s%>

<S%H3117>Behold,<s%> the day, <S%H935>behold,<s%> it comes: your <S%H6843>doom<s%> is gone <S%H3318>forth;<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> has <S%H6692>blossomed,<s%> <S%H2087>pride<s%> has <S%H6524>budded.<s%>

<S%H2555>Violence<s%> has risen <S%H6965>up<s%> into a <S%H4294>rod<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness.<s%> None of them shall <S%H1995>remain,<s%> nor of their multitude, nor of their <S%H1991>wealth.<s%> There shall be nothing of value among <S%H5089>them.<s%>

The <S%H6256>time<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> draws <S%H5060>near:<s%> <S%H7069>don't<s%> let the buyer <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> nor the <S%H4376>seller<s%> <S%H56>mourn;<s%> for <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is on all its <S%H1995>multitude.<s%>

For the <S%H4376>seller<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> to that which is <S%H4465>sold,<s%> although they be yet <S%H2416>alive:<s%> for the <S%H2377>vision<s%> is touching the whole <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H7725>it,<s%> none shall return; neither shall <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> himself in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

They have <S%H8628>blown<s%> the <S%H8619>trumpet,<s%> and have made all <S%H3559>ready;<s%> but none <S%H1980>goes<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> for my <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is on all its <S%H1995>multitude.<s%>

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H1004>within:<s%> he who is in the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> and he who is in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> shall devour <S%H398>him.<s%>

But those of those who <S%H6403>escape<s%> shall <S%H6412>escape,<s%> and shall be on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> like <S%H3123>doves<s%> of the <S%H1516>valleys,<s%> all of them <S%H1993>moaning,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
All <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> and all <S%H1290>knees<s%> shall be <S%H3212>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

They shall also <S%H2296>clothe<s%> themselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H6427>horror<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H955>them;<s%> and shame shall be on all <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> on all their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

They shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> their <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall be as an <S%H5079>unclean<s%> <S%H3701>thing;<s%> their silver and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> they shall not <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> their <S%H5315>souls,<s%> neither <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H4578>bowels;<s%> because it has been the stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

As for the <S%H6643>beauty<s%> of his <S%H5716>ornament,<s%> he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in <S%H1347>majesty;<s%> but they <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%> <S%H5414>therein:<s%> therefore have I made it to them as an unclean <S%H5079>thing.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> for a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for a <S%H7998>spoil;<s%> and they shall profane <S%H2490>it.<s%>

My <S%H6440>face<s%> will I <S%H5437>turn<s%> also from <S%H2490>them,<s%> and they shall profane my <S%H6845>secret<s%> <S%H6530>place;<s%> and robbers shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H2490>it,<s%> and profane it.

<S%H6213>Make<s%> the <S%H7569>chain;<s%> for the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H4941>crimes,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

Therefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7451>worst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H1004>houses:<s%> I will also make the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of the <S%H5794>strong<s%> to <S%H7673>cease;<s%> and their holy <S%H6942>places<s%> shall be <S%H2490>profaned.<s%>
<S%H7089>Destruction<s%> <S%H935>comes;<s%> and they shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and there shall be none.

<S%H1943>Mischief<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H1943>mischief,<s%> and <S%H8052>rumor<s%> shall be on <S%H8052>rumor;<s%> and they shall <S%H1245>seek<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> but the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H56>mourn,<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H926>troubled:<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to them after their <S%H1870>way,<s%> and according to their own <S%H4941>judgments<s%> will I <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3045>them;<s%> and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
